import React, { ChangeEvent, FormEvent } from 'react' import { FormData} from './reducer' import {forms} from './formmodel' interface Props { onInputChange: (e: ChangeEvent) => void onSelectChange: (e: ChangeEvent) => void onSubmit: (e: FormEvent) => void formData: FormData } const Form = ({ onInputChange, onSelectChange, onSubmit, formData }: Props) => { const data = { Name : formData['user']['name'] , Email : formData['user']['email'], Pregnancies : parseInt(formData['user']['pregnancy']), Glucose : formData['user']['glucose'], BloodPressure : formData['user']['pressure'], SkinThickness : formData['user']['thickness'], Insulin : formData['user']['insulin'], BMI : formData['user']['bmi'], DiabetesPedigreeFunction : formData['family']['states'][0], Age:formData['user']['age'] } console.log(data) return (
{ forms.map((form, index)=>(
)) }
{JSON.stringify(formData)}
) } export default Form
